name: The Beautiful Game
description:
-=-=-=-=-=-=- GLITCH ARCADE PRESENTS -=-=-=-=-=-

THE BEAUTIFUL GAME

The Beautiful Game is a physics based, multiplayer football game.

I was given an assignment to create a physics based multiplayer game

and as a lover of football myself, decided that this was the game I wanted

to make for this assignment.

Before the game was made, I had to make a pitch for the game for my classmates to vote on

and out of roughly 20 students, my pitch was one of 5 to get selected for development.

The development of the project was logged at:

https://nextgenjordan.wordpress.com/synoptic-project/

The process has been rigorous, its been rough and the product is something I'm proud of.

I hope you enjoy the game as much as I loved making it.

-=-=-=-=- CONTROLS -=-=-=-=-

WASD - Player 1 Movement

Left Shift - Player 1 Tackle

Left Ctrl - Player 1 Jump

ARROW KEYS - Player 2 Movement

Right Shift - Player 2 Tackle

Left Ctrl - Player 2 Jump

-=-=-=-=- JOYCON SUPPORT -=-=-=-=-

Connect your Nintendo Joy-Cons to your PC for a better experience!

Before opening The Beautiful Game

Press the button between SL and SR to begin pairing mode.

In your bluetooth settings, find Joycon (L) and connect.

In your bluetooth settings, find Joycon (R) and connect.

Open The Beautiful Game and play to your hearts content.
